Accomodation

We strongly recommend you book accommodation as soon as possible as it does get booked up quickly for the summer season. At the time of writing (September 2015) both of the Premier Inn hotels in Weymouth are already fully booked for that weekend!

Cove Holiday Park – coveholidaypark.co.uk

The Holiday park is right next door to the castle and run by the same Estate. The park has a range of accommodation for all tastes and budgets including Chalets, Pods and Static Holiday Homes. The holiday park are offering a significant discount (57% on static holiday homes!!) for our wedding so please mention Katie & Chris’ when you call to book.

Contact number: 01305 821286

Pod (Sleeps 2) – £70 per night. Only 2 available.

Static holiday home (Sleeps 4-6) – £240 for 2 nights.

Cove lodge (sleeps 6) – £600 for 2 nights

Stonecleave (sleeps 8 + 2 children under 5) – £960 for 2 nights.

The Riviera Hotel, Weymouth – rivieraweymouth.co.uk

The Rivier Hotel in Weymouth is an Art Deco hotel with comfortable modern rooms. The hotel is about 20 minutes away from the castle. We will organise transportation back to the hotel in the evening. The hotel have offered a 10% discount if you mention you are from Chris and Katie’s wedding party. The 10% discount is included in the prices below.

Contact number: 01305 836600

Standard Double/Twin – £71.10 per night room only or £80.10 including breakfast.

Seaview Double/Twin – £80.10 per night room only or £89.10 including breakfast.

Single room – £49.50 per night room only or £54 including breakfast.

Being a seaside resort there are plenty of accommodation options in Weymouth and the surrounding area. Trip Advisor has some other great alternatives but you may want to check out some of the following:

Dorset Holiday Cottages – dorsetholidaycottages.co.uk

Dorset Bed and Breakfasts – bedandbreakfast-directory.co.uk

Local Info

There is plenty of things to see and do in the local Weymouth and Portland area. The visit-dorset website has lots of information about the top things to do. And there is always TripAdvisor.

Local Eating

The Crab House Cafe - crabhousecafe.co.uk.
The Cove House Inn, Portland - thecovehouseinn.co.uk.
The Blue Fish Cafe and Restaurant, Portland - thebluefishrestaurant.co.uk.
The Boat that Rocks, Portland - theboatthatrocks.co.uk.
